Text.Page:
The mekonaris continue to disrupt our research and subjugation efforts. We want you to put a stop to it.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:55#5#mekonari arcanathieves} and {@LinkCreature:55#6#depredators} around the Plaza of the Fallen.

Report to Jola at Valumnir Outpost when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
